import React, { Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { deleteExercise } from '../../../actions/training' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const ExerciseItem = ({ deleteExercise, trainingId, auth, exercise: { _id, name, series, reps }}) => { return ( {name} {series} {reps}

{' '} Add exercise

) } ExerciseItem.propTypes = { trainingId: PropTypes.number.isRequired, exercise: PropTypes.object.isRequired, auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired, deleteExercise: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null, { deleteExercise })(ExerciseItem)
